verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I can do all things Through my Lord who strengthens me! I can do all things, Not by might, nor by strength, but by His Spirit!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are running to obtain the Prize And for the Joy set before us, we will not despise The race we’re running, it’s the road to Life! And God will give a yielded heart The grace to run, the will to come, to believe…..{/lang-eng}
